DOC.brief_title: Topiramate Binge Eating Disorder Among Adolescents
DOC.criteria: Subjects ( age 12 23 ) include Met criterion bulimia nervosa eat disorder NOS bingeeating behavior DSMIVTR , Had weight > = 100th % expect body weight age , Engaged binge eat least week 9 12 week prior study entry , Were judge clinician stable enough treated psychiatric condition outpatient ( i.e , acute suicidality , hallucination , unstable vital sign persistently abnormal laboratory result due eat disorder ) . Subjects whose psychotropic medication change within 4 week prior entry start psychotherapy within 3 month prior entry exclude . Subjects also exclude take carbonic anhydrase inhibitor , carbamazepine , phenytoin , phenobarbital , valproic acid , even primrose oil oral contraceptive . Other exclusion criterion : history substance use disorder within 6 month prior study , IQ < = 70 , medical condition cause weight loss ( i.e. , hyperthyroidism , diabetes mellitus type 1 , malignancy ) contra indicate treatment topiramate ( nephrolithiasis glaucoma ) , history non response poor tolerance topiramate past history nonadherence medication treatment .
